title: 如何看待穆斯林议员Ilhan Omar被曝做小三事件重创民主党选票？
contents:
Nearly one of every three dollars spent on Ilhan Omar's campaign has gone to her alleged lover's firm

www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/nearly-one-of-every-three-dollars-spent-on-ilhan-omars-campaign-have-gone-to-her-alleged-lovers-firm

DC consultant's alleged affair with Ilhan Omar is front and center in divorce papers
https://www.foxnews.com/politics/ilhan-omar-affair-dc-consultant-divorce-papers


钱也给了。

人也睡了。

婚也离了。

就差坐牢，就完美了。

(来源站已被蓝金黄) forums.huaren.us/showtopic.aspx?topicid=2448305
